body_html:
@sandeepkumar8713 I haven't worked with SavedModels, so I'd need to dig into the details. However, note that:

kmeans.cluster_centers()

is equivalent to

tf.train.load_variable(kmeans.model_dir, 'clusters')

Will that work for you? I am not sure if there is a way to get this variable out of the SavedModel.

body:
@sandeepkumar8713 I haven't worked with SavedModels, so I'd need to dig into the details. However, note that:
```
kmeans.cluster_centers()
```
is equivalent to
```
tf.train.load_variable(kmeans.model_dir, 'clusters')
```
Will that work for you? I am not sure if there is a way to get this variable out of the SavedModel.
